com.epoch.session

Class StudentSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.session.UserSession
      • com.epoch.session.StudentSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnySessionConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InstructorSession

    public class StudentSession
extends UserSession
    A student's work session.

        public CrossCourseReport getCrossCourseReport(String[] studentIds,
                                              int[] courseIds,
                                              String searchExp)
                                       throws DBException
        Gets students' results from the selected courses, in which the question statement or keywords contain an expression.
        Parameters:
        studentIds - login IDs of students whose results should be retrieved
        courseIds - ID numbers of courses of which results should be retrieved
        searchExp - word fragment, word, phrase, simple boolean expression, or regular expression for which to search question statements and keywords
        Returns:
        results of evaluation of responses
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getForumPosts

        public Map<ForumTopic,ArrayList<ForumPost>> getForumPosts(String searchExp)
                                                   throws DBException
        Gets all posts within topics that contain an expression.
        Parameters:
        searchExp - word fragment, word, phrase, simple boolean expression, or regular expression for which to search forum posts
        Returns:
        linked map of posts that contain the expression, keyed by topic; topics will be retrieved in reverse chronological order of their most recent posts
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

                   throws DBException,
                          UniquenessException,
                          StudentNumConstraintException,
                          StudentEmailExistsException
        Set my school student ID number.
        Parameters:
        studentNum - student ID number
        Throws:
        UniquenessException - when more than one user has this user's login ID
        StudentNumConstraintException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that student ID number
        StudentEmailExistsException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that email
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • setStudentNum

        public void setStudentNum(String studentNum,
                          boolean store)
                   throws DBException,
                          UniquenessException,
                          StudentNumConstraintException,
                          StudentEmailExistsException
        Set my school student ID number.
        Parameters:
        studentNum - student ID number
        store - whether to store the new number in the database
        Throws:
        UniquenessException - when more than one user has this user's login ID
        StudentNumConstraintException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that student ID number
        StudentEmailExistsException - when another student at the same school as this user already has that email
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

        true if am enrolled in the course

                      throws DBException

        Parameters:
        hwId - ID number of the assignment
        Returns:
        ID numbers of the questions assigned to this student in an assignment
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getHWNumsSavedUnsubmitted

        public int[] getHWNumsSavedUnsubmitted()
                                throws DBException
        Gets 1-based indices of assignments containing questions that were saved but not submitted. We convert IDs retrieved from database into serial numbers here, rather than get the serial numbers directly from the database, because some of the course assignments may be invisible to this student.
        Returns:
        array of 1-based assignment indices
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

                              int newCrsNum)
                       throws DBException

        Parameters:

        newCrsNum - new 1-based serial number of the course
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
